metadata.name: InVaria 2222 - Amwaj20
metadata.description: First real estate fractionalized NFT with customized ERC-1155 standard. Amwaj20 is a service apartment located in the Kingdom of Bahrain, and connected through RWA tokenization model, also our first RWA NFT, which enable holder to acquire values of rental income during staking, and more benefits to expect.

attributes.value: Building no. 2008, Road no. 5717, Block no. 257, Amwaj, Kingdom of Bahrain
